title: Linux chsh Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux chsh command, learn how to change the default shell, and verify the changes with practical examples.

verify.name: Verify the default shell for the labex user
verify.hint: The default shell for the labex user should be set to /bin/zsh. Please check the output of the 'echo $SHELL' command.
